'''Radiant Spincrystal 94''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[A Pearl Amongst Legends]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a crate East of [[Tunigi Hollow]], [[Gavireh Lajavard]], [[Sumeru]].
